mapper.select: select count(*) as count from ${param1} where ${param2} like '%'||#{param3}||'%'
select * from(select * from (select rownum as rn, p. * from ((select * from member where name like '%'||#{param2}||'%' order by mseq desc) p)) where rn>=#{param1.startNum}) where rn<=#{param1.endNum}
mapper.insert: insert into event(eseq, subject, content, startdate, enddate, image, state) values(eseq.nextVal, #{subject}, #{content}, sysdate, to_Date(#{enddate},'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{image}, #{state} )
mapper.update: update event set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, image=#{image}, enddate=to_Date(#{enddate},'yyyy-MM-dd'), state=#{state} where eseq=#{eseq}
mapper.insert: insert into product (pseq, kind1, kind2, kind3, pname, price1, price2, price3, content, image, useyn) values(pseq.nextVal, #{kind1}, #{kind2}, #{kind3}, #{pname}, #{price1}, #{price2}, #{price3}, #{content}, #{image}, #{useyn})
mapper.select: select * from product where kind1= #{param1} and kind2 = #{param2}
